SearchModule.ModuleDescription: Extracts the line number of record matches search key 1 (xpath) in an XML file and outputs the search result

The input file and the gjbm jbm file is the result of dependence search and knowledge base search,
Search Keywords 1 is an option for custom output directory The default is to output a report to the 「eclipse\plugins\tubame.portability-*/report」 under . If you want to change the output destination , specify the report output directory with the full path to Search Keywords 1 .
Search Keywords 1:c://report
Search Keywords 2 is an option for the package pie chart of dependency search tool . Results dependent search , when many packages that are not available in the target environment is present , together some of these packages It is useful when you want to aggregate . If you are together as weblogic (weblogic.A, weblogic.B, ...) packages starting from "weblogic" for example , were aggregated together as the struts org.apache.struts is , I specify a search keyword 2 as follows .
Search Keywords 2:weblogic=weblogic;struts=org.apache.struts
When the report output in this form , aggregate pie chart of the package are categorized weblogic, the struts, it is aggregated
